page.title: 19GLOSSOPDALE HEALTH CARE (2)
page.content: The third hospital is{Woods Hospital.} This serves the local community by 1. continuing care for patients after surgical operations 2. providing treatment for patients (often elderly) of local General Practioners 3. offering holiday respite for the elderly and disabled 4. caring for the terminally ill 5. nursing old people when sick Many of the{facilities}have been provided through{'Friends'}, and volunteers over 16 yrs are needed to help in the work. There is a{ {counselling}service for the{bereaved. {The Future } Many wish to see the hospitals develop as{community {hospitals}supporting the primary health care of G.Ps, district nurses, and midwives and other specialist health workers. (see p.18 above)
